title: BRIEF-S.A. Competition Commission Recommends Tribunal Unconditionally Approve Aramco-SABIC Deal
text:
BRIEF-S.A. Competition Commission Recommends Tribunal Unconditionally Approve Aramco-SABIC Deal

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Sep 12, 2019 15:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-S.A. Competition Commission Recommends Tribunal Unconditionally Approve Aramco-SABIC Deal Sept 12 (Reuters) - South Africa's Competition Commission: * RECOMMENDED THAT TRIBUNAL APPROVE PROPOSED DEAL WHEREBY ARAMCO INTENDS TO BUY SABIC WITHOUT CONDITIONS * UNCONDITIONALLY APPROVED PROPOSED MERGER WHEREBY SPAR (JO: ) GROUP INTENDS TO BUY ISIGIDI & TROPICAL EDEN

BRIEF-S.A. Competition Commission Recommends Tribunal Unconditionally Approve Aramco-SABIC Deal
description: BRIEF-S.A. Competition Commission Recommends Tribunal Unconditionally Approve Aramco-SABIC Deal
